text:
I've noticed in 1.3 when I create a sig, I get an empty \n #text element between
each line in the DOM output of the sig. I'd like to throw in a request to have
an option to suppress any whitespace in the output when the DOM elements are
generated. Would make things a little easier for one particular client which is
on an non-ASCII/UTF platform.
creator: glen.smith@gmail.com
sean.mullan@oracle.com
text:
I don't think this is a problem anymore. If it is, please reopen it and add more
details.
